input_text.Prompt:
Generate an exciting product description that includes the product title and features in one paragraph of 6-8 sentences.

Product title:
SPRINGROSE 90 x 132 Inch Commercial Grade Heavy Duty Black Polyester Rectangle Tablecloths (Pack of 10)

Product features:
-Polyester
-Dimensions: 90” x 132” rectangle
-Pack of 10
-Color: Black
-Machine washable
-Great For weddings, banquets, anniversary parties, receptions, etc.
input_text.Response A: These heavy duty polyester tablecloths are great for any special event! The 90 x 132 inch dimension is perfect for large tables, and the black color will complement any decor. They are extremely durable and machine washable, so you can use them over and over again. These tablecloths are sold in a pack of 10, making them an exceptional value.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
